Issue.creator: jjjjibm
Issue.summary: 15:10:05.134 eventhub_producer Chat -> ERRO 017 Error during Chat, stopping handler: stream error: code = 1 desc = "context canceled"
Issue.environment: Vlaunch VM running Ubuntu 14 (Trusty). There's no vagrant.
Issue.description: ERRO 017 Error during Chat, stopping handler: stream error: code = 1 desc = "context canceled" + I attached logs from yesterday's run. Peer logging level = DEBUG is set. On the client side, I captured stdout and stderr. If you will look in the tracing, you'll see some interesting error messages: *18:32:36.210 ledger CommitTxBatch -> DEBU 37e There were some erroneous transactions. We need to send a 'TX rejected' message here. * Here is a link to Ratnakar's sample: https://github.com/ratnakar-asara/NodeSdkSample/tree/master/events I am running on a vlaunch VM. Ratnakar runs in vagrant on a laptop, but he reports seeing the message too. >
